name: Miami Vice: The Game
description:
SEA, SUN & CRIME

It's here at last! The game based on the most famous police series of the 1980's!
Stylish Miami is being overrun by the Columbian drugs mafia, and only the world's two super-coolest cops can stop them. Rogue cops and players become one in the dangerous universe of Miami Vice. Set in today's Miami, Miami Vice The Game lets you go deep undercover as narc officers Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs.
